card-bike.title: My Passion
card-bike.description: Motorbikes are something that can give you freedom and happiness, simply with the sound of the engine or its aesthetics, they are fine and elegant.

card-me.title: Me: Aleksander
card-me.data: I'm from Granada, Spain, I'm 20 years old and I'm still growing!
card-me.description: I am a very proactive person, I like learning and discovering new things, apart from web development I also like videogames and playing sports.

card-web.title: Web development
card-web.description: It's something that didn't really appeal to me at first, but in the end I ended up studying it and it's one of my passions and hobbies to this day because I enjoy it and I have a good time, because you don't stop learning all the time.

card-curiosidad.title: Curiosity
card-curiosidad.description: I think that in order to be successful, apart from making an effort and dedicating time to it, if you are not a curious person and you don't want to learn new things and it doesn't attract your attention, you can't do it because that means you don't like it.
